articles.title: Italy may have registered Europe's hottest temperature on record - BBC News
articles.description: If the registered reading is verified, it will be hottest temperature ever recorded in Europe.
articles.content:
image captionThe Mediterranean heatwave has led to the spread of wildfires across southern Italy
The Italian island of Sicily may have registered the hottest temperature ever recorded in Europe - 48… [+1849 chars]

articles.author: Pushkala Arikata
articles.title: EU regulator investigates possible new side-effects of mRNA Covid vaccines - Independent.ie
articles.description: EUROPE’S drugs regulator is looking into three new conditions to assess whether they may be possible side-effects related to Covid-19 vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna following a small number of cases.
articles.content: EUROPES drugs regulator is looking into three new conditions to assess whether they may be possible side-effects related to Covid-19 vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna following a small number of cases… [+1238 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea face Villarreal in Super Cup - SuperSport
articles.description: Belfast's Windsor Park is the stage for the 46th edition of the UEFA Super Cup, the annual curtain-raiser contested by the holders of the two biggest European club competitions.
